alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Emmons; Logan; McIntosh; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 1:57PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory Tuesday, snow and blowing snow with total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch late Tuesday night through Thursday morning, additional accumulations between 3 and 5 inches with widespread blizzard conditions possible. * WHERE...Sioux, Emmons, Logan, Mcintosh, and Dickey counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Tuesday to Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Tuesday Night. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Tuesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow and widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility making travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
